i18n.title: Responsive Flexbox Centering Techniques
i18n.description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of flexbox centering in CSS. You will learn how to horizontally and vertically center child elements within a parent element using flexbox. By the end of this lab, you will be able to create responsive and visually appealing layouts using flexbox centering techniques.

meta.title: CSS Flexbox Centering | Responsive Web Design
meta.description: Learn how to horizontally and vertically center child elements within a parent element using CSS Flexbox. Create visually appealing and responsive layouts.
meta.keywords: CSS, Flexbox, Centering, Responsive Web Design, Layout

i18n.title: 响应式弹性盒布局居中技术
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索CSS中弹性盒布局的居中概念。你将学习如何使用弹性盒布局在父元素内水平和垂直居中子元素。在本实验结束时，你将能够使用弹性盒布局居中技术创建响应式且视觉上吸引人的布局。
